Yes, I've read it--an enjoyable read. However, I
wouldn't list it as a "biography". It's historical
fiction--you couldn't have dialogue in a biography of
someone who's been dead for 400 years. I'd pick it up,
if it interests you. It's more enjoyable than Samurai
William, in my opinion. 

Nate
